scripts.clean: cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf app/build && cd ..
scripts.make-apk: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && mv ./app/build/outputs/apk/app-release.apk ../app.apk && echo done
scripts.remake-apk: npm run clean && npm run make-apk
scripts.native-rename: rm -rf ios android ; mv index.android.js .index.android.js.tmp 2> /dev/null || true ; react-native upgrade && react-native android ; mv .index.android.js.tmp index.android.js 2> /dev/null || true
scripts.show-debug-key: echo ------ Default passowrd is : android ------ && keytool -list -v -keystore ~/.android/debug.keystore
